column1: Who is better: Matt Thomas or Jimmer Ferdet
Who would win in a game of 1 on 1, current Michael Jordan vs Matt Thomas?
[Jones] The Utah Jazz are waiving guard Matt Thomas, League Sources tell The Athletic
[FantasyLabsNBA] Matt Thomas to be waived by the Utah Jazz
[Smith] Matt Thomas has signed with the Chicago Bulls, a league source tells @spotrac.

[Marks] Contract info on the signings in Chicago: Stanley Johnson, Ethan Thompson and Matt Thomas are non-guaranteed. Alize Johnson has a $250K guarantee if no waivers by 10/19. His second year has a 7/2 guaranteed date. 13 guaranteed and 4 non-guaranteed.
